thread.title: Comcast to turn nonvoting K shares into common stock, preserving Roberts family control
thread.title_full: Comcast to turn nonvoting K shares into common stock, preserving Roberts family control

title: Comcast to turn nonvoting K shares into common stock, preserving Roberts family control
text:
Published By: Philly Business - Today 
Comcast Corp. will reclassify 347 million non-voting K shares as regular common stock while preserving the Roberts family 33 percent voting ...
